items.question: What makes your measurements special?
items.answer: Our AI-powered fit engine captures over 100 data points from a simple phone scan to deliver tailor-grade precision without studio visits.

items.question: How long does delivery take?
items.answer: Custom pieces typically ship within 7-10 business days. We partner with trusted couriers to provide end-to-end tracking.

items.question: Can I collaborate with a stylist?
items.answer: Absolutely. Schedule a virtual appointment inside the app to co-create outfits, finalize fabrics, and review fit adjustments.

items.question: Do you have a brand identity kit?
items.answer: Yes. Designers receive asset packs, measurement guidelines, and distribution support to maintain brand consistency across experiences.
